column5: Traffic;Phnom Penh: City Hall is preparing plans to build a new flyover bridge
column6: near Kbal Trach in Phnom Penh.------The bridge will be constructed near the intersection between Monivong and Street 271.------It is hoped that the impacts will be assessed soon
column7: so that work can begin. The project aims to reduce traffic congestion in the area south of the capital.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/699594.html------Â ------View post on imgur.com
